title: Salve (12C32)
text:
Set:	Black Rider
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Spell. To play, spot a [Gandalf] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound that would kill him or her, discard this condition to prevent that wound.
Rarity:	C
